He joined the company during a period of rapid growth with a focus on facilitating ongoing national expansion efforts, improving upon the high levels of service and expertise provided to Adreimaâ€™s client hospitals, and streamlining the companyâ€™s post-acquisition integration processes.

Prior to joining Adreima, Ken was CEO of Phoenix Baptist Hospital where he spearheaded a significant operational and financial turn-around for the 231-bed facility. As a result, he was awarded the Vanguard Health System People Pillar Award and the Healthstream Excellence Award for Medical Staff Satisfaction.
